00020 #define SaveDelete(p)       { delete (p); (p) = 0; }

00022 // Obsolete - use ASSERT_ALWAYS or ASSERT_DEBUG instead
00023 #if !defined(ASSERT)
00024     #if defined(_MSC)
00025         #include <assert.h>
00026         #define ASSERT(cond)            assert(cond)
00027     #else
00028         #define ASSERT(cond)            Trap::Assertion(cond, __FILE__, __LINE__);
00029     #endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 // Obsolete - use ASSERT_DEBUG_INFO instead
00033 #if !defined(ASSERT_INFO)
00034 /*
00035     #define ASSERT_INFO(cond, text) {                   \
00036         if (!(cond)) {                                  \
00037             DBG_OUT((0, L"ASSERTION: "text L"\n"));     \
00038         }                                               \
00039         ASSERT(cond);                                   \
00040     }
00041 */
00042     #define ASSERT_INFO ASSERT_DEBUG_INFO
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------
00046     ASSERT_ALWAYS
00047     ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00048 #if !defined(ASSERT_ALWAYS)
00049     #if defined(_MSC)
00050         #include <assert.h>
00051         #define ASSERT_ALWAYS(cond)     assert(cond)
00052     #else
00053         #define ASSERT_ALWAYS(cond)     Trap::Assertion(cond, __FILE__, __LINE__);
00054     #endif
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------
00058     ASSERT_DEBUG
00059     ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00060 #if defined(_DEBUG)
00061     #if !defined(ASSERT_DEBUG)
00062         #if defined(_MSC)
00063             #include <assert.h>
00064             #define ASSERT_DEBUG(cond)  assert(cond)
00065         #else
00066             #define ASSERT_DEBUG(cond)  Trap::Assertion(cond, __FILE__, __LINE__);
00067         #endif
00068     #endif
00069     #if !defined(ASSERT_DEBUG_INFO)
00070         #define ASSERT_DEBUG_INFO(cond, text)   {           \
00071             if (!(cond)) {                                  \
00072                 DBG_OUT((0, L"ASSERTION: "text L"\n"));     \
00073             }                                               \
00074             ASSERT_DEBUG(cond);                             \
00075         }
00076     #endif
00077 #else
00078     #if !defined(ASSERT_DEBUG)
00079         #define ASSERT_DEBUG(cond)
00080     #endif
00081     #if !defined(ASSERT_DEBUG_INFO)
00082         #define ASSERT_DEBUG_INFO(cond, text)
00083     #endif
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------
00087     ASSERT_DEBUG_HOST
00088     ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00089 #if !defined(ASSERT_DEBUG_HOST)
00090     #if defined(_DEBUG)
00091         #if defined(_MSC)
00092             #include <assert.h>
00093             #define ASSERT_DEBUG_HOST(cond)         assert(cond)
00094         #else
00095             #define ASSERT_DEBUG_HOST(cond)
00096         #endif
00097     #else
00098         #define ASSERT_DEBUG_HOST(cond)
00099     #endif
00100 #endif

00102 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------
00103     DBG_OUT
00104     ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00105 #if ( defined(_DEBUG) || defined(APOXI_ENABLE_DBG_OUT) )
00106     #define DBG_OUT(args)   Os::DbgOut args
00107 #else
00108     #define DBG_OUT(args)
00109 #endif

00120 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------
00121     Unused
00122     ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00123 template<class T> inline void Unused(const T &t)
00124 {
00125     const T *x = &t;
00126     x++;
00127 }

00129 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------
00130     Disable warning C4355 for the Microsoft Visual-Studio Compiler:
00131     << 'this' : used in base member initializer list >>
00132     because 'this' is always used in a clean way.
00133     ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00134 #if defined(APOXI_COMPILER_MSVC)
00135     #pragma warning(disable : 4355)
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------
00139     #pragma message (LOC_W("iii to do"))
00140     dumps 
00141       z:\lnz_development\src\apoxi\devices\win32\Dummy.cpp(15): Warning: iii to do
00142     into build window of Visual Studio.
00143     That row can be double clicked to go to the source.
00144     ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00145 #if defined(APOXI_COMPILER_MSVC)
00146     #define LOC_HELPER2(z) #z
00147     #define LOC_HELPER1(y) LOC_HELPER2(y)
00148 
00149     #define LOC_W(x) __FILE__ "(" LOC_HELPER1(__LINE__) "): Warning: " x
00150     #define LOC(x) __FILE__ "(" LOC_HELPER1(__LINE__) "): " x
00151 #else
00152     #define LOC(x)
00153     #define LOC_W(x)
00154 #endif

00156 #undef min
00157 #define min(a,b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
00158 
00159 #undef max
00160 #define max(a,b) (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b))
